divs: Sighting DetailsThis happened back in mid 1996...I was sleeping with my window open and at about 5 am I woke up from the constant whirl of a helicopter over the house...I looked out the window..it was still dark, I thought maybe there had been an accident on the highway which was about a mile away because many times if that happened a news helicopter would hover over the scene. It was still dark out and I was SHOCKED when I looked up at the sky and saw this big disc shaped object with different colored lights all around it just hovering and this helicopter (which looked like maybe a green army helicopter) was hovering just watching it. I watched them both just hover there for about 3 min when suddenly, the disc shaped object turned and took off so fast it was gone in an instant! The helicopter slowly turned and then flew away. It was the strangest thing!! But I have no doubt that I saw a UFO being watched by the military! Another time on that property I was standing on the back deck of the house and looked off into the trees and saw a flourescent green rod shaped light flittering around..it was so strange! I told someone about it and they said they are actually some extraterrestrial thing called 'Rods' ...anyhow, there is obviously activity in this area!
Summary: Saw UFO hovering in Bloomfield NJ
